thread.title: Gillian Bishop

author: Gillian Bishop
title: Gillian Bishop
text: We found Trusted Housesitters to be truly a life saver and our dogs were so comfortable at being left in their own home and walking in their normal environment. Our sitters bought their own little dog with them and she fitted in so well with our own 3 dogs. I would truly recommend TH's as an alternative to boarding as well as looking after our dogs, our house was in safe hands too. I didn't have any of the normal concerns for our dogs and house whilst I was away. Thank you very much.
